welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Selden, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets, indulge in our local cuisine, and enjoy all that Selden has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary concourse for domestic flights at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the secondary concourse for domestic flights at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is available for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
